Summary: i saw a bright copper/gold flash that turned into a whitish orb
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There was one other sighting in San Jose on or around August 15th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was driving on south tully rd. because of the s.j.i.airport large aircraft are constantly landing and taking off. there is almost no small air traffic in this area. as i was coming to the intersection of tully and old tully rd. low to the horizon i saw a strange copper gold flash. the shape was very strange and not a typical reflection. a smallish fuzzy whitish orb appeared to emerge from the flash and propel itself away at high speed. it climbed to 3\4 of a mile sharply banked to the right dove and seemed to hide behind the the big blue arch of the fairgrounds. as this was happening i was the passenger so i could keep my eye on it as we made a u-turn i kept watching and it did not pass the arch in the foreground really as if it was hiding behind it from my view.
